TopicTitle: What is Your Favorite Movie? (Oldies Included)

Articles.Content:
Musical:  My Fair Lady / Repo Man

Scifi: Interstellar

Comedy: Time Bandits / Bubba Hotept

Action / Adventure:  Indiana Jones Temple of Doom

Ok so Im going to add to my list.

Overall Top Favorite: Lady and the Tramp (1955 animated)

Sci-Fi: Avatar (2009)

Action: Top Gun and Iron Eagle

Historical Action/Drama: Last Samurai

Comedy: Tie: Mr. Mom, Kindergarten Cop, Planes Trains and Automobiles (((commas removed for separation from list))), Big, and Money Pit

Fighting: Blood Sport and Karate Kid 1&2 (ralph macchio pat morita)

082007192024
recent events have made me want to watch taxi driver again.

Sci-fi: Tron Legacy, The Martian, Interstellar, original trilogy and prequels (some were bad)

Comedy: Dr. Strangelove

Action: both Top Gun movies

Historical: Dunkirk
